properties.title: Luxury 3-Bedroom Apartment in Georgetown
properties.description: Beautiful luxury apartment in the heart of Georgetown. Features modern finishes, secure parking, and 24-hour security. Walking distance to restaurants and businesses.

properties.title: Cozy 1-Bedroom Cottage
properties.description: Charming cottage with a small garden perfect for singles or couples. Quiet neighborhood with friendly neighbors. Recently renovated with new appliances.

properties.title: Spacious Family Home with Yard
properties.description: Perfect for families, this 4-bedroom home features a large backyard, modern kitchen, and living area. Located in a quiet community with easy access to schools and shopping.

properties.title: Modern Studio Apartment
properties.description: Fully furnished studio apartment with all utilities included. Perfect for students or young professionals. Secure building with laundry facilities.

properties.title: Waterfront Property with Amazing Views
properties.description: Stunning waterfront property with panoramic river views. Features a large deck, modern kitchen, and spacious bedrooms. Perfect for those who love nature and tranquility.

properties.title: Budget-Friendly 2-Bedroom
properties.description: Affordable 2-bedroom home in a quiet Linden neighborhood. Basic furnishings included. Great value for those on a budget.

properties.title: Executive Apartment in Business District
properties.description: Luxury executive apartment in the heart of Georgetown's business district. High-end finishes, concierge service, and premium amenities. Perfect for professionals.

properties.title: Charming Heritage Home
properties.description: Beautifully restored colonial-era home with original architectural details. High ceilings, wooden floors, and a peaceful garden. A unique opportunity to own a piece of Guyana's history.

properties.title: Modern Townhouse
properties.description: Contemporary townhouse in a growing community. Open concept living, modern kitchen, and private patio. Close to shopping centers and restaurants.

properties.title: Coastal Retreat
properties.description: Relaxing home just minutes from the beach. Perfect for those seeking a quieter pace of life. Large windows with natural light and ocean breezes.
